Nom du service EN: Portail of the General Treasury of the Kingdom
Tags EN: Statistical Bulletin, public finances, local finances, Moroccan Public Procurement Portal, PMMP, tenders, public procurement, public AO, public AOs, business opportunities, AO submission, AO response, tender response, GID-Suppliers, Online territorial tax declaration, territorial taxes, tax declarations, online territorial tax payment, Fixed radars, radars, Administrative situation consultation, local authorities, administrative actions, payroll details, civil servant payroll, salary certificate, online banking, atf
DESCRIPTION EN EN: The web portal offers a unified interface allowing users to easily access a variety of essential features. It centralizes the latest news concerning the activities of the General Treasury of the Kingdom (TGR), , the monthly statistical bulletins of public and local finances, thus offering an overview of current developments and initiatives. In addition, the portal brings together all relevant financial regulatory texts, facilitating consultation and understanding of the laws and regulations in force. Finally, it provides access to a complete range of online services, allowing users to carry out various administrative procedures with ease, thus strengthening the efficiency and transparency of operations.

Thématique 1: Papiers, Famille et Citoyenneté

Lien EN: http://www.apostille.ma/
Nom du service EN: National portal for legalization of documents to be used abroad (Apostille)
Tags EN: document legalization, document authentication, apostille convention, international legalization
DESCRIPTION EN EN: An apostille is a certificate that authenticates the origin of a public document (e.g., a birth or death certificate, a court decision,…). Apostilles can only be issued for public documents originating in a country that is a party to the La Haye Convention and intended for use in another country that is also a party to the Convention.

DESCRIPTION EN EN: The MaRoute application provides information on road incidents by offering the following services to its users: - Display on a map of events that disrupt or block roads (accidents, snow, floods, construction, etc.); - Mobile push notifications of nearby road incidents; - Consultation of the status of a route (incidents, construction, points of caution, etc.); - Proposal of detours on the map.

Nom du service EN: Simpl-IR - Income tax (professionals)
Tags EN: SimplIR Professional, revenue tax, income tax, tax declarations, tax payments, income tax, tax online payments, IR declaration, professional IR declaration, income taxes
DESCRIPTION EN EN: Simpl-IR Professionnel facilitates individual professionals in fulfilling declarations and payments pertaining to income tax. It also enables businesses to submit their declarations and payments concerning income tax withheld from salaries, remunerations, and benefits granted to employees. Moreover, it allows pension institutions to declare beneficiaries and insurers to report benefits provided in the form of capital or annuity. Additionally, it empowers professionals to submit profit declarations, contribution declarations, option requests, income and profit telepayments, withholding tax telepayments, and social contribution telepayments.

It enables you to pay for a reference, purchase a stamp, pay for a vignette and retrieve the attestation, verify a certificate, access online web services or join SIMPL. The Daribati member's area offers various functionalities, enabling members to manage their member's area, consult their tax account, declarations filed, payments made, unpaid amounts with payment option, recover certificates, track claims or refund requests, purchase stamps or pay vignettes, in addition to accessing all web services.
